name: Binky show
description:
Meet Binky, a clown from the city of Portland. Binky loves his job and cinema, but hates when old movies get remade. So while his travelling circus stayed in a town of River-Road on the outskirts of Missouri state, and Binky heard that a remake of his favorite movie came out, he couldn’t keep the rage inside...

Explore the Portland Town, find hidden weapons, save yourself from Binky and his friends, and don't fall into his traps. become the Binky's hunter. If Binky wins, Town of Portland dies.
- Variety of enemies
- Disturbing atmosphere of madness.
- City full of dangers
